com.bugsnag.android

Class Error

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bugsnag.android.Error
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JsonStream.Streamable

    public class Error
extends java.lang.Object
implements JsonStream.Streamable
    Information and associated diagnostics relating to a handled or unhandled Exception.

    This object is made available in BeforeNotify callbacks, so you can inspect and modify it before it is delivered to Bugsnag.

    See Also:
    BeforeNotify

      • setContext

        public void setContext(java.lang.String context)
        Override the context sent to Bugsnag with this Error. By default we'll attempt to detect the name of the top-most Activity when this error occurred, and use this as the context, but sometimes this is not possible.
        Parameters:
        context - what was happening at the time of a crash

      • getContext

        public java.lang.String getContext()
        Get the context associated with this Error.

      • setGroupingHash

        public void setGroupingHash(java.lang.String groupingHash)
        Set a custom grouping hash to use when grouping this Error on the Bugsnag dashboard. By default, we use a combination of error class and top-most stacktrace line to calculate this, and we do not recommend you override this.
        Parameters:
        groupingHash - a string to use when grouping errors

      • getGroupingHash

        public java.lang.String getGroupingHash()
        Get the grouping hash associated with this Error.
        Returns:
        the grouping hash, if set

      • setSeverity

        public void setSeverity(Severity severity)
        Set the Severity of this Error.

        By default, unhandled exceptions will be Severity.ERROR and handled exceptions sent with bugsnag.notify will be Severity.WARNING.

        Parameters:
        severity - the severity of this error
        See Also:
        Severity

      • getSeverity

        public Severity getSeverity()
        Get the Severity of this Error.
        See Also:
        Severity

      • setUser

        public void setUser(java.lang.String id,
                    java.lang.String email,
                    java.lang.String name)
        Set user information associated with this Error
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the user
        email - the email address of the user
        name - the name of the user

      • addToTab

        public void addToTab(java.lang.String tabName,
                     java.lang.String key,
                     java.lang.Object value)
        Add additional diagnostic information to send with this Error. Diagnostic information is collected in "tabs" on your dashboard.

        For example:

        error.addToTab("account", "name", "Acme Co."); error.addToTab("account", "payingCustomer", true);

        Parameters:
        tabName - the dashboard tab to add diagnostic data to
        key - the name of the diagnostic information
        value - the contents of the diagnostic information

      • clearTab

        public void clearTab(java.lang.String tabName)
        Remove a tab of app-wide diagnostic information from this Error
        Parameters:
        tabName - the dashboard tab to remove diagnostic data from

      • getMetaData

        public MetaData getMetaData()
        Get any additional diagnostic MetaData currently attached to this Error.

        This will contain any MetaData set by setMetaData or addToTab.

        See Also:
        setMetaData(com.bugsnag.android.MetaData), addToTab(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.Object)

      • setMetaData

        public void setMetaData(MetaData metaData)
        Set additional diagnostic MetaData to send with this Error. This will be merged with any global MetaData you set on the Client.

        Note: This will overwrite any MetaData you provided using Bugsnag.notify, so it is recommended to use addToTab instead.

        Parameters:
        metaData - additional diagnostic data to send with this Error
        See Also:
        addToTab(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.Object), getMetaData()

      • getExceptionName

        public java.lang.String getExceptionName()
        Get the class name from the exception contained in this Error report.

      • getExceptionMessage

        public java.lang.String getExceptionMessage()
        Get the message from the exception contained in this Error report.

      • getException

        public java.lang.Throwable getException()
        The exception which triggered this Error report.

      • setDeviceId

        public void setDeviceId(java.lang.String id)
        Sets the device ID. This can be set to null for privacy concerns.
        Parameters:
        id - the device id

      • getDeviceData

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getDeviceData()
        Retrieves the DeviceData associated with this error
        Returns:
        the device metadata
